card.name: Turn to Mist
card.text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vampire Ministrant
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Grace of the Firemanes
card.text: Enchant creature When Grace of the Firemanes enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn" and "{W}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Nature's Chant
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Stern Strongarm
card.text: When Stern Strongarm becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.name: Melek's Electromancer
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Fin-Clade Researcher
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fin-Clade Researcher.

card.name: Footlight Fiend
card.text: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Fervent Fungus-Binder
card.text: Reach When Fervent Fungus-Binder enters the battlefield, mill two cards. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Pensive Trog
card.text: Trample Pensive Trog gets +1/+1 as long as you're in a trance. (You're in a trance if you've cast a noncreature spell or created a token this turn.)

card.name: Azorius Throughway
card.text: Azorius Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {WU}, Discard Azorius Throughway: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Orzhov Throughway
card.text: Orzhov Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {WB}, Discard Orzhov Throughway: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Boros Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {RW}, Discard Boros Throughway: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Selesnya Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {GW}, Discard Selesnya Throughway: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Dimir Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {UB}, Discard Dimir Throughway: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Izzet Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {UR}, Discard Izzet Throughway: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Simic Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {GU}, Discard Simic Throughway: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Rakdos Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {BR}, Discard Rakdos Throughway: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Golgari Throughway
card.text: Golgari Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {BG}, Discard Golgari Throughway: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Gruul Throughway
card.text: Gruul Throughway enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {RG}, Discard Gruul Throughway: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Inscrutable Hieromancer
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, create a Clue token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, Inscrutable Hieromancer gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Aurelia, Wings of Justice
card.text: Flying, haste When Aurelia, Wings of Justice enters the battlefield, return each creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Rakdos, Unholy Patron
card.text: Flying, trample, haste Other attacking creatures you control get +2/+0 and have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, sacrifice it."

card.name: Arrester's Manacles
card.text: Equipped creature gains vigilance and "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it." Equip {1}

card.name: Slice Through Consciousness
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target creature if its mana value is greater than the number of cards in its controller's hand. • Target creature gets -1/-1 for each card in its controller's hand.

card.name: Enter the Carnarium
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them this turn. At the beginning of your next end step, if there are any cards exiled with Enter the Carnarium, put them into your graveyard, then you lose that much life.

card.name: Goblin Anarchomancer
card.text: Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Tend the Gardens
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {1}{G}{W}, Sacrifice Tend the Gardens: Create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Kaya's Cunning
card.text: When Kaya's Cunning enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life. Whenever a token you control dies, you may return Kaya's Cunning to your hand.

card.name: Unending Experimentation
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

card.name: Skull Prophet
card.text: {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {T}: Mill two cards.

card.name: Solemn Prayer
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. You gain life equal to the total mana value of the discarded cards.

card.name: Bounding Krasis
card.text: Flash When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

card.name: Lyev Prosecutor
card.text: As Lyev Prosecutor enters the battlefield, choose a card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Key Performer
card.text: When Key Performer enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles two cards from their hand. Until your next turn, they may play one of those cards. When they do, you may play the other card until the end of your next turn. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Gruul Riotmancer
card.text: {T}: Add {R}{G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, you may have that creature enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. If you don't, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Alluring Hierarch
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Leeching Advokist
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, each player loses 1 life. {W}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Erratic Plasmologist
card.text: Trample Whenever you spend one or more mana to cast a noncreature spell, put that many +1/+1 counters on Erratic Plasmologist.

card.name: Putrid Mass
card.text: Whenever Putrid Mass attacks, mill two cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on Putrid Mass for each nonland card milled this way. You gain 1 life for each land card milled this way. When Putrid Mass dies, you may put any number of cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Imposing Recruitment
card.text: Choose one — • Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. They gain indestructible until end of turn. • Imposing Recruitment deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Emergent Ooze
card.text: {1}{G}{U}: You may have Emergent Ooze become a 1/1 Ooze creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Lavinia's Guildmage
card.text: {W}{U}, {T}: Tap target nonland permanent. {2}{W}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Lazav's Guildmage
card.text: {U}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains menace until end of turn. {U}{B}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Rakdos's Guildmage
card.text: {B}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {4}{B}{R}, {T}: Target opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Borborygmos's Guildmage
card.text: {R}{G}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. {4}{R}{G}, {T}: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

card.name: Trostani's Guildmage
card.text: {G}{W}, {T}: Untap two other target permanents. Activate only once each turn. {G}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Tomik's Guildmage
card.text: {W}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}{W}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ral's Guildmage
card.text: {U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {2}{U}{R}, {T}: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Vraska's Guildmage
card.text: {B}{G}, {T}: Mill three cards. {3}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aurelia's Guildmage
card.text: {R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {4}{R}{W}, {T}: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Vannifar's Guildmage
card.text: {G}{U}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {4}{G}{U}, {T}: Bifurcate target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (If it isn't a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)

card.name: Justiciar of Retribution
card.text: Flying, first strike When Justiciar of Retribution enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target tapped creature. Evoke {1}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Abnormal Endurance
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

card.name: Street Swarm Elder
card.text: When Street Swarm Elder enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens. If Street Swarm Elder escaped, create two 3/3 black and green Plant Zombie creature tokens instead. Escape—{5}{G}{G}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Vedalken Lawmage

card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Havoc Jester deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Evangel of Growth
card.text: {T}: Create a Treasure token. {6}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Evangel of Growth: Create two green and white Elemental creature tokens with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Beguiling Sheepopotamus
card.text: When Beguiling Sheepopotamus enters the battlefield, tap target creature you don't control and put a stun counter on it. {4}{U}: Bifurcate Beguiling Sheepopotamus. (If it isn't a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)

card.name: Dinrova Abductor
card.text: Prevent all damage Dinrova Abductor would deal to players.

card.name: Give Chase
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Give Chase deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

card.name: Battle of the Titans
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt to that creature this way.

card.name: Prudent Konstructor
card.text: Flying When Prudent Konstructor enters the battlefield, scry 1, then draw a card. Evoke {U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Piper of the Slums
card.text: Whenever Piper of the Slums enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. Whenever a Rat you control deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Ordruun Strategist
card.text: Haste Warmind (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have another target creature gain this creature's abilities this turn.) {R}: Ordruun Strategist gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Growth-Chamber Champion
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}, where X is its mana value. If you do, bifurcate it. (If it isn't a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.) {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors.

card.name: Lingering Spirits
card.text: When Lingering Spirits enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile target card from a graveyard, then create a 1/1 black and white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Spell Parry
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard a card. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you discarded a card that shares a card type with that spell, counter it instead.

card.name: Rooftop Assassin
card.text: When Rooftop Assassin enters the battlefield, destroy target tapped creature you don't control.

card.name: Deafening Blast
card.text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevent this turn. Deafening Blast deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. card.name: Overgrown History
card.text: Console {G} (You may tap two untapped creatures you control to cast this spell for its console cost.) You gain 3 life. If this spell was consoled, you gain 8 life instead. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Deceptive Saboteur
card.text: Distraction (This creature can't be blocked as long as there is an unblocked attacking creature with greater power.) Whenever Deceptive Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, return up to one target artifact or creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Heir of Szadek
card.text: Distraction (This creature can't be blocked as long as there is an unblocked attacking creature with greater power.) Whenever Heir of Szadek deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, destroy target creature or planeswalker that player controls.

card.name: Chaos Bolts
card.text: Chaos Bolts deals 2 damage to each nontoken creature.

card.text: When Cackling Ragemutt enters the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you don't, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. Cackling Ragemutt can't block as long as it has a counter on it.

card.name: Garrison Commando

card.name: Grand Arbiter Lavinia
card.text: Vigilance Cards can't leave graveyards. Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards.

card.name: The Failure of the Guildpact
card.text: Target player mills half their library, rounded up. You may cast a card from among them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lazav, Master Shapeshifter
card.text: You may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter become a copy of that creature, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability."

card.name: Mizzix's Overload
card.text: Exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value X or less from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost. Repeat this process up to X times. Exile Mizzix's Overload.

card.text: Flying When Angelic Satirist enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose two at random — • Each player draws a card and loses 2 life. • Each player sacrifices a creature. • Each player discards a card. • Exile each player's graveyard.

card.name: Svogthir, Ever-Growing
card.text: Svogthir, Ever-Growing enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Svogthir. {X}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Svogthir: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value X.

card.text: Creature tokens you control have hexproof. When Ghired, Zhur-Taa Proven enters or leaves the battlefield, if you don't control a Rhino, create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample.

card.name: Audience Participation

card.name: Stunning Directive

card.text: Reach

card.name: Begin the Trance
card.text: Untap target creature. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Ethereal Armaments
card.text: Enchant creature Apparition (When enchanted creature dies, if it wasn't a token, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying then return this to the battlefield attached to it.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.

card.name: Mizzium Sledge
card.text: Flash When Mizzium Sledge enters the battlefield, until end of turn target creature loses all abilities and can't gain any abilities this turn.

card.name: Subsidy of Influence
card.text: Enchant creature Apparition (When enchanted creature dies, if it wasn't a token, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying then return this to the battlefield attached to it.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 has trample and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

card.name: Rubblebelt Rider
card.text: Rubblebelt Rider has flying as long as you are in a trance. (You're in a trance if you've cast a noncreature spell or created a token this turn.) Whenever Rubblebelt Rider attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Burning-Tree Druid
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you're in a trance. (You're in a trance if you've cast a noncreature spell or created a token this turn.)

card.name: Will of the Conclave
card.text: Console {1}{W} (You may tap two untapped creatures you control to cast this spell for its console cost.) Will of the Conclave deals damage to target creature equal to the number of creatures you control. If Will of the Conclave was consoled, draw a card.

card.name: Mech-Mage's Insight
card.text: Draw two cards. Catalyze {2}{U}{U} (As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile this card from your graveyard and pay its catalyze cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Izoni's Webstrider
card.text: Menace When Izoni's Webstrider enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Gateless Blacksmith
card.text: When Gateless Blacksmith enters the battlefield, create a tapped Treasure token. Whenever Gateless Blacksmith attacks, you may sacrifice a token. When you do, Gateless Blacksmith deals 1 damage to each opponent. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Warden of the Concordance
card.text: When Warden of the Concordance enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. {1}{G}, Discard Warden of the Concordance: You gain 2 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Luxury District
card.text: Luxury District enters the battlefield tapped. Luxury District untaps during each player's untap step. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Elemental RAR
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact
card.text: Flying Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact enters the battlefield or attacks, exile target card from your graveyard that's exactly two colors. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Spirit RAR
card.text: Flying

card.name: Dragon RAR
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Rhino RAR
card.text: Trample

card.name: Assassin RAR
card.text: Deathtouch

card.name: Treasure RAR
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Clue RAR
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Bat RAR
card.text: Flying
